name: Trickster VR: Co-op Dungeon Crawler
description: A procedurally generated fantasy adventure, starring floating islands, epic loot and a horde of orcs! Try your skills against orcish combat expertise, ancient magic and ragtag airships!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5-4430 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i7-4820K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 1 GB available space
